description:
The Rock Tree has a mysterious big rock on top of it. Bonobono and Chipmunk believe it got there when a tree sprouted and lifted up the rock. Raccoon begins to climb the tree to try it for himself, but at that moment, the big rock falls out of the tree!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ishi no Ki no Ookina Ishi
The Big Rock of the Rock Tree
